title: Advertisement Whereas his sacred Majesty, by his patent, hath constituted Sir Robert Sibbald, one of his physicians in ordinary, his geographer for his kingdom of Scotland, and commandeth and ordaineth him to publish the description of the Scotia antiqua & Scotia moderna, and the natural history of the products of his ancient kingdom of Scotland...
author: Sibbald, Robert, Sir, 1641-1722.
publisher: Printed by John Reid, at his Printing-House in Bells-Wynd,
